title: Anadarko posts quarterly profit as oil prices recover
text:
36 PM / in 4 minutes Anadarko posts quarterly profit as oil prices recover Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Oil and gas producer Anadarko Petroleum Corp on Tuesday reported a fourth-quarter profit, compared with a year-earlier loss, on recovery in global crude oil prices. 
Net income attributable to Anadarko was $976 million, or $1.80 per share, in the quarter ended Dec. 31, from a loss of $515 million, or 94 cents per share, a year earlier. 
Anadarkoâ€™s revenue rose 22.7 percent to about $2.93 billion. 
Sales volumes of oil, natural gas and natural gas liquids averaged about 637,000 BOE per day, down from 774,000 a year earlier. Reporting by Taenaz Shakir in Bengaluru; Editing by Anil D'Silva
